titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the cathedrall church of Yorke against popish transubstantiation, and their communion vnder one kinde, the first Sunday in Lent, Ann. Dom. 1607. By Thomas Dodson, Maister of artes.
titleStmt.author: Dodson, Thomas, Master of Arts.

publicationStmt.publisher: By H. L[ownes] for Mathew Lownes, and are to be sould at his shioppe in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Bishoppes head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
